body_html:
sorry for drive-by comment -- providing readers lib/io in C_API feels a little weird -- the API comprises methods for managing computational graph. Parsing TF records is a form of computation, so it can be handled within computational graph as tf.TFRecordReader ops rather than a new method

For some reasons (performance?) people also added standalone utilities that can do TF-related things without using TF runtime -- the record readers, and checkpoint readers. The lib/io example seems to fall under those "standalone" utils
